title: 600.19 ABSTRACTS OF TITLE TO BE RECEIVED IN EVIDENCE.
text: In any action wherein the title to real property is in controversy, any abstract of title thereof, duly certified by any bonded abstracter or by any county recorder of any county wherein such real property is situated, shall be received as prima facie evidence of all instruments therein referred to, together with the records thereof as recorded in the office of the county recorder of such county.
